name: Shuckle

ability.name: Juice Lover
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may search your deck for a card with Berry in its name and attach it to Shuckle. If you do, shuffle your deck. When Shuckle uses a Berry, in addition to its effect, remove 2 damage counters from Shuckle.

attacks.name: Donation
attacks.effect: If Shuckle has a Pokemon Tool attached to it, you may move it to another Pokemon.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters on it between turns instead of 1.

flavor: In their shell, strange juices are produced. Some are nice and shared with friends, while some are reserved for their predators.
